description: I came to Wuhan to see how people cope under lockdown.
title: How to Survive in an Outbreak
title_page: How to Survive in an Outbreak - The New York Times
maintext:
The mood was tense two weeks ago as I headed to Wuhan, China, where the coronavirus outbreak began. But not panicked.
As one train passenger told me, if you’re the panicky type, you’re not on this train.
